name: The Tower (itch) (NEMO)
description:
"The Tower" is my first attempt at making a game. It was made during "My First Game Jam : Winter 2023".

The goal is to protect the villagers during the construction of the divine Tower, wich will pleased the Gods to save them. You control a biblically "accurate" angel sent on the planet to help the villagers.

CONTROLS :

- Arrows : move

- Space : place a divine area that killed monsters
=> in menu, space/left click to validate

It was a pleasant but very difficult experience and I hope i can improve in the future and make more polished and appealing games. Any feedback is appreciated.

Made with GameMaker Studio 2.

N.B : there's currently a bug that leads to game over when the villager in down left corner is killed, even when there's still villagers alive. I recommand to protect this one in priority.
